sections.heading: and transfers nontestamentary.Except as provided in sections 30-2313 to 30-2319 (elective share of surviving spouse) or as a consequence of, and to the extent directed by, section 30-2726, a transfer resulting from the application of section 30-2723 is effective by reason of the terms of the account
sections.text: and transfers nontestamentary.Except as provided in sections 30-2313 to 30-2319 (elective share of surviving spouse) or as a consequence of, and to the extent directed by, section 30-2726, a transfer resulting from the application of section 30-2723 is effective by reason of the terms of the account involved and sections 30-2716 to 30-2733 and is not testamentary or subject to sections 30-2201 to 30-2512 (estate administration).SourceLaws 1993, LB 250, ยง 11.
